contentrichtext.text: The '''Observatoire de la Côte d'Azur''' ('''OCA''', ''Côte d'Azur Observatory'') originated in 1988 with the merger of two [[Observatory|observatories]]: # [[Nice Observatory|Observatoire de Nice]] # [[Centre de recherches en géodynamique et astrométrie]] (CERGA) == See also == * [[Lunar Laser Ranging Experiment]] == External links == * [http://www.oca.eu/?lang=en Côte d'Azur Observatory official website (English version)] {{Établissement public à caractère administratif}} {{coord|43.72333|7.30167|type:landmark_source:USNO/HMNAO|display=title}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Cote D'Azur Observatory}} [[Category:Astronomical observatories in France]] {{observatory-stub}}
